verses.text: A Song of Degrees. They that trust in the Lord \add shall be\add* as mount Sion: he that dwells in Jerusalem shall never be moved.
The mountains are round about her, and \add so\add* the Lord is round about his people, from henceforth and even for ever.
For the Lord will not allow the rod of sinners to be upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous should stretch forth their hands to iniquity.
Do good, O Lord, to them \add that are\add* good, and to them \add that are\add* upright in heart.
But them that turn aside to crooked ways the Lord will lead away with the workers of iniquity: \f + \fr 124:5 \fqa Or, \ft let peace be.\f*\add but\add* peace \add shall be\add* upon Israel.
